statements: DELETE FROM historical_price_data WHERE id = 1 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM historical_price_data WHERE date < '2021-01-01' AND volume > 10000;
DELETE FROM historical_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND label > 0.5;
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM trading_algorithm WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM algorithm_parameters WHERE model_id = 1 AND param_value < 0.5;
